pkgmetadata.longdescription: Solve Delay Differential Equations // Solves ordinary and delay differential equations, where the objective function is written in either R or C. Suitable only for non-stiff equations, the solver uses a 'Dormand-Prince' method that allows interpolation of the solution at any point. This approach is as described by Hairer, Norsett and Wanner (1993) ISBN:3540604529. Support is also included for iterating difference equations.
